They were assembled by Prof. Saotome and became Earth's first line of defense against the Dinosaur Empire, which is a civilization of reptile-like humanoids, who evolved from the now-extinct dinosaurs that roamed the earth millions of years ago.  \n  \nThe series was groundbreaking in the anime mecha genre: for the very first time, it introduced the concept of separate machines combining to form a super robot. Using three jets, Getter Robo could combine in three different ways to create three different versions of Getter Robo for different conditions and situations. This idea was originally discussed during the creation process for Mazinger Z (the first super robot to be piloted internally), but was dropped and then developed for Getter Robo. This combination idea proved to be a very powerful concept that has been used in the super robot genre ever since."},"links":{"al":"31551","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/%E3%82%AA%E3%83%AA%E3%82%B8%E3%83%8A%E3%83%AB%E7%89%88-%E3%82%B2%E3%83%83%E3%82%BF%E3%83%BC%E3%83%AD%E3%83%9C-1-%E5%BE%A9%E5%88%BB%E5%90%8D%E4%BD%9C%E6%BC%AB%E7%94%BB%E3%82%B7%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%82%BA-%E6%B0%B8%E4%BA%95/dp/4778033035/ref=monarch_sidesheet","ap":"getter-robo","cdj":"https://www.cdjapan.co.jp/product/NEOBK-1728597","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/121721/","kt":"3302","mal":"1551","mu":"20809","raw":"https://www.fukkan.com/fk/CartSearchDetail?i_no=68323083"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"07251805-a27e-4d59-b488-f0bfbec15168","name":{"en":"Thriller"}},{"id":"256c8bd9-4904-4360-bf4f-508a76d67183","name":{"en":"Sci-Fi"}},{"id":"36fd93ea-e8b8-445e-b836-358f02b3d33d","name":{"en":"Monsters"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"50880a9d-5440-4732-9afb-8f457127e836","name":{"en":"Mecha"}},{"id":"5fff9cde-849c-4d78-aab0-0d52b2ee1d25","name":{"en":"Survival"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"ac72833b-c4e9-4878-b9db-6c8a4a99444a","name":{"en":"Military"}},{"id":"b29d6a3d-1569-4e7a-8caf-7557bc92cd5d","name":{"en":"Gore"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdad7e68-1419-41dd-bdce-27753074a640","name":{"en":"Horror"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}},{"id":"f8f62932-27da-4fe4-8ee1-6779a8c5edba","name":{"en":"Tragedy"}}]}

ace pilot, Commander Char Aznable, thought he could foil the Federation's plan to build a mobile suit by attacking their research base on colony Side 7. He was wrong. With a prototype already active, the besieged Federation forces strike back using their new weapon, the mobile suit Gundam, with devastating consequences. Amidst the fighting, young electronics wizard Amuro Ray is determined not to let his friends and family die in the crossfire. But what can one boy do to repel a squad of mobile suit-clad invaders?  \n\n[Official English](https://kodansha.us/series/mobile-suit-gundam-the-origin/)\n[Alternate Official English](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_CW01000002020000_68/)\n\n---\n- **Won the Seiun Award for Best Comic in 2012**\n---\n\n**Links:**  \n- [OVA on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=13105)","es-la":"El piloto as de Zeon, el comandante Char Aznable, pensó que podría frustrar el plan de la Federación de construir un Mobil Suit atacando su base de investigación en la colonia Side 7. Se equivocó. Con un prototipo ya activo, las fuerzas de la Federación asediadas contraatacan utilizando su nueva arma, el Mobile Suit Gundam, con consecuencias devastadoras. En medio de la lucha, el joven mago de la electrónica Amuro Ray está decidido a no dejar que sus amigos y su familia mueran en el fuego cruzado. Pero, ¿qué puede hacer un chico para repeler a un escuadrón de invasores vestidos con mobile I taught him how to become a tyrant and asked for the country.\n\n\"I will do as the lady wishes.\"\n\nHe conquered the whole empire for me, and I ran away.\n\n\"I came to take you, Charlize Ronan,\" Dylan had become a perfect tyrant and searched the entire empire for me.\n\n\"You tamed me, so why did you run away?\"\n\n---\nAll Charlize Ronan ever wanted was to bring honor to her family. But instead, she is forced into becoming a “living sword” -- a mere tool for the emperors. It is from this hell that she prays for justice… and awakens in her former body. Now, determined to tear down this horrible empire, Charlize seeks out the young prince, Dylan Blade. She will put him on the throne, not as an honorable ruler, but as a tyrant. It is time for Charlize to tame the one who will bring forth her revenge.\n\n---\n**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/52478267), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=6005645)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%8F%AD%EA%B5%B0%EC%9D%84-%EA%B8%B8%EB%93%A4%EC%9D%B4%EA%B3%A0-%EB%8F%84%EB%A7%9D%EC%B3%90%EB%B2%84%EB%A0%B8%EB%8B%A4/2457), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/56310553)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* English: [Radish](https://radishfiction.com/stories/18026), [Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-taming-of-the-tyrant/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E6%88%91%E5%9C%A8%E9%A6%B4%E6%9C%8D%E6%9A%B4%E5%90%9B%E5%BE%8C%E8%90%BD%E8%B7%91%E4%BA%86/155)\n* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/webtoon/fuir_le_tyran_que_jai_cree)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.delitoon.de/detail/dad_0010059)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/I-Tamed-a-Tyrant-and-Ran-Away/179)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/72074)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%89%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%8A%E0%B9%83%E0%B8%AB%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%A0%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%A5%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%81/173)","es":"Dios me dio la oportunidad de revivir mi vida. After I reincarnated, I thought I'd be pampered and live a life of luxury, but his Majesty said, \"A reincarnator's life is likely to be targeted.\" (As you can see, my identity was discovered.)   \n  \nThe original personality of her reincarnated body, Emilia, also appears as a ghost. The prince refused to accept the new queen. Ah, the pitiful (?) Prince Snow White... f4c54c2d-b62d-400b-9591-e498d0203c3b:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"f4c54c2d-b62d-400b-9591-e498d0203c3b","title":{"en":"Edogawa Ranpo Bizarre Manga Museum: Hell's Clown \u0026 The Golden Mask"},"altTitles":[{"ja-ro":"Edogawa Ranpo Ryouki Mangakan - Jigoku Doukeshi Ougon Kamen"},{"ja":"江戸川乱歩猟奇漫画館 地獄の道化師・黄金仮面"}],"lastChapter":"6","description":{"en":"The second project commemorating the 50th anniversary of Edogawa Ranpo's death. Contains two feature-length stories in which Akechi Kogoro, the famous detective created by Edogawa Ranpo, takes on bizarre and difficult cases caused by his two rival monsters. ■ \"Hell's Clown'' (illustration by Hisashi Sekiya) / The corpse of a young woman wrapped in plaster is left behind on the street in broad daylight. And is the clown doll sent to the woman's sister a foretaste of her death? The true identity of the \"clown from hell\" who continues to commit crimes as if to mock Akechi Kogoro is unexpected!? ■ \"Golden Mask\" (illustration by Ryuichiro Kita) / Depicts the deadly battle between the monster Golden Mask and Akechi Kogoro . In the early Showa era, it started with rumors of a mysterious figure wearing a gold mask appearing out of nowhere... There have been a number of reports of sightings of golden masks, including in Ginza and at certain railroad crossings on the Tokaido Line at night. His appearance was described as \"his face was glowing gold, and a line of bright red liquid was flowing from his mouth.'' Who exactly is the Golden Mask? One day, what is the big incident that the Golden Mask finally caused? In addition to the full-length manga, there are also \"Edogawa Ranpo and the Clown of Hell'', ``Introduction to the Kitakyushu City Manga Museum'', and ``Edogawa Ranpo and the Golden Mask''. Also includes special articles such as \"Introducing Edogawa Ranpo Corner at Nabari City Library\". Full of Edogawa Ranpo's unique and bizarre atmosphere, this book is a must-read even if you are not a Ranpo fan!"},"links":{"amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/-/en/江戸川-乱歩-ebook/dp/B017CVXQY6/ref=tmm_kin_swatch_0?_encoding=UTF8\u0026qid=\u0026sr=","bw":"de7094105c-9d96-4d71-8f3f-c90fbbe18365","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/336020/","mu":"gckqqmg"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"suggestive","tags":[{"id":"cdad7e68-1419-41dd-bdce-27753074a640","name":{"en":"Horror"}},{"id":"df33b754-73a3-4c54-80e6-1a74a8058539","name":{"en":"Police"}}]}

Sin embargo, los casos en los que los culpables ocultan su identidad suelen ser demasiado complejos como para que la exterminadora de youkais se encargue de ello.\n\nEntra en escena Satori Komeiji. Como youkai satori, posee un tercer ojo que le permite leer las mentes, detectando a cualquier criminal sin importar las mentiras que pueda inventarse. Con su extraordinaria aptitud como detective, Satori es capaz de resolver todos los misterios que se le plantea, aunque no siempre quiera salir de su mansión.","pt-br":"Touhou Chireikiden é a primeira webcomic oficial da série Touhou Project, escrita por ZUN com ilustrações da novata Ginmokusei, apresentando Satori Komeiji como a mestra detetive das profundezas da Terra.\n\nPode ser lido em japonês gratuitamente no web blog oficial: https://touhougarakuta.com/comic/touhouchireikiden_1/","vi":"Manga chính thức thứ 5 của Touhou, kịch bản được viết bởi ZUN và được minh họa bởi Ginmonkusei (Sau này được đổi thành Akimaki Yuu vì sức khỏe của Ginmonkusei có vấn đề) \n\nBộ truyện tập trung vào Satori Komeji, một yêu quái có khả năng đọc tâm trí người khác, cô bắt đầu trở thành thám tử và đi giải quyết các vụ án ở khắp Ảo Tưởng Hương."},"links":{"al":"112917","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B08ZMHDLGD","ap":"touhou-chireikiden-hansoku-tantei-satori","bw":"series/260196","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/602328","mal":"122572","mu":"162116","raw":"https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_AM21201276010000_68/"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"5ca48985-9a9d-4bd8-be29-80dc0303db72","name":{"en":"Crime"}},{"id":"a1f53773-c69a-4ce5-8cab-fffcd90b1565","name":{"en":"Magic"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"e197df38-d0e7-43b5-9b09-2842d0c326dd","name":{"en":"Web Comic"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}},{"id":"ee968100-4191-4968-93d3-f82d72be7e46","name":{"en":"Mystery"}}]}

f5671c1a-5517-4c3c-aa8b-fde32da8363c:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"f5671c1a-5517-4c3c-aa8b-fde32da8363c","title":{"en":"The Runaway Tanker"},"altTitles":[{"ja-ro":"Daibousou"},{"en":"Large Runaway"},{"ja":"大暴走"}],"lastChapter":"3","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"An anthology of three Tezuka oneshots from the late 1960's.   \n  \n- **The Runaway Tanker** - Newscaster Goro Tsukinashi is invited to board the world's first atomic-powered, computer-operated oil tanker, the Osakabe Maru. While on its maiden voyage, everything that could go wrong, does go wrong. Can the passengers survive aboard this voyage of the damned?   \n  \n- **Land of the Tigermen** - Television director Goro Ibukuro makes his living exploiting the talents of others on his most popular show, World's Cruelest Acts. After hearing about a tribe of \"Tigermen\" that live in the hinterlands of Borneo that apparently have a miracle cure in the form of a ceremony, he decides to set off and film them. This was serialized in the Asahi Shinbun, a famous newspaper, by Tezuka's then chief assistant, Toshio Ban, not long after Tezuka's passing. Ban interviewed as many surviving family, friends, and colleagues of Tezuka's as well as gathering other research materials.\n\nThe content is divided into three arcs (per volume) covering a period of Tezuka's life, which are as follows:\n\n- **Volume 1 - The Appearance of Osamushi, 1928~1945** (オサムシ登場, Osamushi Toujou) - Covers Tezuka's youth, his developing talents during his school days, fascinations with bugs, manga, and animation, and his trials and tribulations during the war.\n\n- **Volume 2 - Dreams of Manga, 1945~1959** (漫画の夢, Manga no Yume) - Covers the immediate struggles of the Post-War period, his time in medical school and the decision between being a physician or a mangaka, his debut and career throughout out the 50s. Also covers the emergence of the assistant system, the many assistants that would later become famous mangaka themselves (Matsumoto, Ishinomori, the Fujios, etc.), the obsession with movies and the influence they have on manga, and the gradual shift toward animation.\n\n- **Volume 3 - Dreams of Anime, 1960~1989** (アニメの夢, Anime no Yume) - Covers his time entering animation interning at Toei, the founding of his Anime Studio, Mushi Production, the culture of the studio, the anime adaptation of Astro Boy (Tetsuwan Atom) and the emerging anime production philosophies, the collapse of Mushi Production, the \"Dark Tezuka\" period, Tezuka Productions,  Black Jack, the events leading to the Osamu Tezuka Complete Works, later anime productions, and his tragic passing.\n\n[Official f59b01e3-2e05-4883-a9cd-3f718363fd04:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"f59b01e3-2e05-4883-a9cd-3f718363fd04","title":{"en":"High Position"},"altTitles":[{"en":"Hai Poji"},{"en":"Haipoji"},{"en":"ハイポジ"},{"en":"ハイポジ HIGH POSITION"},{"en":"하이포지"}],"lastChapter":"39","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en","es-la"],"description":{"en":"Mitsuhiko Amano is full of regrets. A 46 year old salaryman who had just been laid off, he was told that his wife wanted a divorce, something that he might have been wanting for years. So he visits a soapland, a place he hasn't been since he started dating his wife 22 years ago. While there, a fire suddenly erupts, trapping Amano and a soapland girl in the bath. In a rare moment of bravery and decisiveness, Amano attempts to lead the girl to safety, only to slip and hit his head. As his consciousness fades, he sees the back of the soapland girl making her escape… A fresh set of regret blankets him as he passes out, that his wife Sachiko and daughter Miyu will be objects of ridicule that he died in such a place…  \n  \nThen he awakens. In front of him is Ozawa Satsuki, a girl he hardly knew but secretly liked in high school. And Takahashi, Nakao-san, and Iijima-kun too. All his high school friends in their high school uniform, in their, and his, old high school… He has slipped 30 years into his past.  \n  \nHas he been given a second chance? To change his life so that the regrets that weighed him down never happen this time around?"},"links":{"al":"99296","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/gp/product/B077LBT8VL","ap":"high-position","bw":"series/118659","cdj":"http://www.cdjapan.co.jp/product/NEOBK-2091557?s_ssid=e315e85c04a29e7b5a","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/413553/","kt":"49508","mal":"107251","mu":"139209"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"suggestive","tags":[{"id":"292e862b-2d17-4062-90a2-0356caa4ae27","name":{"en":"Time Travel"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"caaa44eb-cd40-4177-b930-79d3ef2afe87","name":{"en":"School Life"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}}]}

f618151b-3ab3-4fbc-9ba0-ee35b471dac3:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"f618151b-3ab3-4fbc-9ba0-ee35b471dac3","title":{"en":"The Reason She Lives as a Villainess"},"altTitles":[{"ko":"그녀가 악녀로 사는 이유"},{"ko-ro":"Geunyeoga Agnyeoro Saneun Iyu"},{"en":"Why She Lives as a Villainess"},{"en":"Why She's a Villainess"},{"en":"Why That Woman Lives as a Villainess"},{"en":"Her Reason to Live as a Villainess"},{"en":"The Reason Why That Woman Lives as a Villainess"},{"de":"Warum sie als Bösewicht lebt?"},{"fr":"La raison que elle vit comme une vilaine"},{"pt":"Por que ela vive como uma vilã"},{"es":"La razón por la que vive como una villana"},{"pl":"Dlaczego ona jest taką nikczemną osobą"},{"pl":"Dlaczego żyła jako złoczyńca?"},{"pl":"Powód, dla którego żyje jako złoczyńca"},{"ru":"Причина, по которой она живет как злодейка"},{"ja":"目覚めたら悪女でした"},{"mn":"Тэр яагаад хорон санаатан шиг амьдардаг вэ?"},{"tr":"Neden bir zorba olarak yaşıyor?"},{"zh":"传闻中的恶女"},{"zh-hk":"她成為惡女的理由"},{"my":"ဗီလိန်အဖြစ်ရှင်သန်ရသည့်အကြောင်းအရင်း"},{"vi":"Lí do tôi sống dưới thân phận ác nữ"},{"vi":"Lý do tôi sống dưới thân phận ác nữ"},{"id":"Kenapa dia hidup sebagai antagonis?"},{"id":"Alasannya hidup sebagai penjahat"},{"id":"Alasan kenapa hidup sebagai penjahat"},{"th":"เหตุผลของคนร้ายๆ"}],"lastChapter":"80","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en","pl"],"description":{"de":"Manche Leute würden alles geben für eine Chance auf ein neues Leben, aber als die knallharte Jeongyun nach einem schrecklichen Unfall aufwacht und sich im Körper von Lecian Fucernien wiederfindet, einem Charakter in einem romantischen Fantasyroman, fühlt sie sich, als wäre sie in einem Albtraum gelandet. Trotz ihrer Enttäuschung akzeptiert sie ihr Schicksal und versucht, das Beste aus ihrem neuen Leben zu machen. Die gute Nachricht ist, Lecian erwartet eigentlich ein Happy End. Die schlechte: Sie muss einmal sterben und wiedergeboren werden, um dieses Ende zu erreichen. Bis dahin muss sie die Intrigen ihres grausamen Vaters abwenden, einen Ausweg aus der fragwürdigen Verlobung mit dem Kronprinzen finden und dem Herzog aus dem Weg gehen, der sie aus irgendeinem Grund zu verfolgen scheint. Wird Jeongyun es schaffen, ihr neues Leben in den Griff zu kriegen? Und wird sie am Ende überleben?\n\n---\n**Original Web Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=51908399), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=4402088), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/2057071567)\n\n[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=57032651)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/comics/the-reason-she-lives-as-a-villainess)\n* [Traditional Chinese / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/villainess/list?title_no=2714)\n* [Simplified Chinese / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/10172/)\n* [French / Français](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/the-reason-she-lives-as-a-villainess-fr)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/the-reason-she-lives-as-a-villainess-de)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/77256)\n* [Spanish / Español](https://www.webtoons.com/es/romance/the-reason-she-became-a-villain/list?title_no=3556)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/romantic-fantasy/the-reason-she-became-a-villain/list?title_no=3159)","en":"Some people would jump at the chance at a new life, but when Jeongyun wakes up after a terrible accident and finds that she has become Lecian Fucernien, a character of a cliché, romantic fantasy novel, it feels like she's woken up inside a nightmare. Disappointed as she is, she quickly accepts her fate and decides to make the best of her new life. The good news is that Lecian's character has a happy ending, but the bad news is that she's supposed to die once to get it. Between foiling her abusive new father's plans of committing treason, finding a way out of her engagement to the crown prince, and avoiding the strange duke who seems to be stalking her, Jeongyun has a very long to-do list. Will Jeongyun be able to adjust to her new life while figuring out a way to avoid dying a second time?\n\n---\nI reincarnated into the body of the main character, the villainess. This was before the villainess went back in time. I know the original plot anyway. I don't have to go back in time and redeem myself, do I? Let's just destroy the original plot while looking for a way to live. In my own way, obviously.\n\n\"Are you going to eat in such an inappropriate way?\"\n\nAt the Marquis' words, Lesian responded carelessly, \"The ancestors used to say that you should treat others the way you want to be treated. You say it's impolite for me to eat in my pajamas, but it doesn’t seem like the Marquis treats his daughter politely either?\"\n\nAt those words, the Marquis shouted angrily, \"You must have finally gone crazy!\"\n\n\"Yes, I am crazy.\"\n\nIs it a big deal to say that I’m crazy anyway when I’m currently possessing a villainess' body?\n\n---\n**Original Web Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=51908399), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=4402088), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/2057071567)\n\n[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=57032651)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/comics/the-reason-she-lives-as-a-villainess)\n* [Traditional Chinese / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/villainess/list?title_no=2714)\n* [Simplified Chinese / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/10172/)\n* [French / Français](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/the-reason-she-lives-as-a-villainess-fr)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/the-reason-she-lives-as-a-villainess-de)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/77256)\n* [Spanish / Español](https://www.webtoons.com/es/romance/the-reason-she-became-a-villain/list?title_no=3556)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/romantic-fantasy/the-reason-she-became-a-villain/list?title_no=3159)","es":"Lesian Hussernien es la protagonista de una conocida novela de fantasía. A pesar de que nació en una familia noble, su vida no fue un lecho de rosas. Tuvo que hacer frente a traiciones y castigos terribles que la convirtieron en una persona cruel y despiadada, y su historia tuvo un final trágico. Entonces, ¿qué pasará cuando una empleada de oficina de Corea del Sur despierte en el cuerpo de una protagonista tan infortunada? ¿Conseguirá evitar el fatídico final que le espera a Lesian y vivir una vida tranquila?\n\n---\n**Original Web Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=51908399), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=4402088), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/2057071567)\n\n[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=57032651)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/comics/the-reason-she-lives-as-a-villainess)\n* [Traditional Chinese / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/villainess/list?title_no=2714)\n* [Simplified Chinese / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/10172/)\n* [French / Français](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/the-reason-she-lives-as-a-villainess-fr)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/the-reason-she-lives-as-a-villainess-de)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/77256)\n* [Spanish / Español](https://www.webtoons.com/es/romance/the-reason-she-became-a-villain/list?title_no=3556)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/romantic-fantasy/the-reason-she-became-a-villain/list?title_no=3159)","fr":"Certains seraient plus qu'heureux d'avoir l'opportunité de changer de vie, mais pour Jeongyun qui, après un terrible accident, se réveille dans le corps de Lecian Fucernian, le personnage d'un roman fantastique hyper cliché, c'est un véritable cauchemar! Malgré sa déception, elle accepte rapidement son sort et décide de faire de son mieux pour mener une vie agréable. La bonne nouvelle, c'est que dans l'histoire, Lecian, est censée finir par filer des jours heureux. La mauvaise nouvelle, c'est qu'elle doit mourir une fois avant d'y arriver. Entre ses tentatives pour déjouer les plans de son père violent qui compte trahir la couronne, pour réussir à annuler ses fiançailles au prince héritier et ses efforts pour éviter l'étrange duc qui semble la suivre partout, Jeongyun a du pain sur la planche. Parviendra-t-elle à s'adapter à sa nouvelle vie et à trouver un moyen d'éviter de mourir une seconde fois?\n\n---\n**Original Web Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=51908399), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=4402088), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/2057071567)\n\n[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=57032651)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/comics/the-reason-she-lives-as-a-villainess)\n* [Traditional Chinese / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/villainess/list?title_no=2714)\n* [Simplified Chinese / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/10172/)\n* [French / Français](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/the-reason-she-lives-as-a-villainess-fr)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/the-reason-she-lives-as-a-villainess-de)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/77256)\n* [Spanish / Español](https://www.webtoons.com/es/romance/the-reason-she-became-a-villain/list?title_no=3556)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/romantic-fantasy/the-reason-she-became-a-villain/list?title_no=3159)","id":"Aku bereinkarnasi ke dalam tubuh karakter utama, penjahat. Ini sebelum penjahat kembali ke masa lalu. Lagipula aku tahu plot aslinya. Aku tidak harus kembali ke masa lalu dan menebus diriku sendiri, bukan? Mari kita hancurkan plot aslinya sambil mencari cara untuk hidup. Dengan cara ku sendiri, jelas. *** \"Apakah kamu akan makan dengan cara yang tidak pantas?\" Mendengar kata-kata Marquis, Lesian menanggapi dengan ceroboh. “Para leluhur dulu mengatakan bahwa Anda harus memperlakukan orang lain sebagaimana Anda ingin diperlakukan. Anda mengatakan tidak sopan bagi saya untuk makan dengan piyama saya, tetapi sepertinya Marquis juga tidak memperlakukan putrinya dengan sopan? ” Mendengar kata-kata itu, Marquis berteriak dengan marah. \"Kamu pasti akhirnya menjadi gila!\" \"Ya, aku gila.\" Apakah itu masalah besar untuk mengatakan bahwa aku gila ketika aku saat ini memiliki tubuh penjahat?\n\n---\nSaya memiliki pemeran utama wanita, yang juga merupakan penjahat dalam sebuah novel. Itu sebelum dia memutar waktu. Aku sudah tahu cerita aslinya, jadi seharusnya aku tidak perlu menjalani kehidupan kedua seperti dia. Mari kita temukan cara untuk bertahan dan menghancurkan cerita aslinya. Dengan caraku sendiri, tentu saja. *** “Apakah kamu akan makan dengan cara yang tidak pantas?” Mendengar kata-kata Marquis, Lesian menanggapi dengan ceroboh. “Para leluhur dulu mengatakan bahwa Anda harus memperlakukan orang lain sebagaimana Anda ingin diperlakukan. Anda mengatakan tidak sopan bagi saya untuk makan dengan piyama saya, tetapi sepertinya Marquis juga tidak memperlakukan putrinya dengan sopan? ” Mendengar kata-kata itu, Marquis berteriak dengan marah. “Kamu pasti akhirnya menjadi gila!” “Ya saya gila.” Saya telah memiliki tubuh penjahat jadi tidak masalah jika saya mengatakan saya gila.\n\n---\n**Original Web Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=51908399), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=4402088), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/2057071567)\n\n[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=57032651)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/comics/the-reason-she-lives-as-a-villainess)\n* [Traditional Chinese / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/villainess/list?title_no=2714)\n* [Simplified Chinese / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/10172/)\n* [French / Français](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/the-reason-she-lives-as-a-villainess-fr)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/the-reason-she-lives-as-a-villainess-de)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/77256)\n* [Spanish / Español](https://www.webtoons.com/es/romance/the-reason-she-became-a-villain/list?title_no=3556)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/romantic-fantasy/the-reason-she-became-a-villain/list?title_no=3159)","pl":"Reinkarnowałam się w ciele głównej bohaterki, będącej złoczyńcą, nim ta cofnęła się w czasie. W każdym razie znam oryginalną fabułę. Nie muszę więc cofać się w czasie i dokonywać odkupienia swych win, prawda? Po prostu zniszczę oryginalny schemat, szukając sposobu na życie. Rzecz jasna, na własnych zasadach. \n\n„Zamierzasz jeść w takim stanie?\" \nNa słowa markiza Lesian odpowiedziała niedbale. \n„Przodkowie zwykli mówić, że powinno traktować innych tak, jak chcemy być sami traktowani. Mówisz, że to nieodpowiednie, żebym jadła w piżamie, ale wydaje mi się, że markiz również nie traktuje dobrze swojej córki.\"\nNa te słowa markiz krzyknął ze złością.\n„Musiałeś w końcu zwariować!„ \n„Tak, jestem szalona.„ \nCzy to naprawdę tak wielka sprawa przyznać, że zwariowałam? Przecież i tak mam ciało złoczyńcy.\n\n---\n**Original Web Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=51908399), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=4402088), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/2057071567)\n\n[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=57032651)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/comics/the-reason-she-lives-as-a-villainess)\n* [Traditional Chinese / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/villainess/list?title_no=2714)\n* [Simplified Chinese / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/10172/)\n* [French / Français](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/the-reason-she-lives-as-a-villainess-fr)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/the-reason-she-lives-as-a-villainess-de)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/77256)\n* [Spanish / Español](https://www.webtoons.com/es/romance/the-reason-she-became-a-villain/list?title_no=3556)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/romantic-fantasy/the-reason-she-became-a-villain/list?title_no=3159)","ru":"Я очнулась в теле главной героини-злодейки. Это случилось еще до ее возвращения в прошлое.\n\nЯ знаю оригинальный сюжет. Мне ведь не нужно умирать и возвращаться в прошлое? Просто разрушу первоначальный сюжет, чтобы выжить. Гениальный план.\n\n«Неужели ты собираешь ужинать в ночной рубашке?»\n\nНа слова маркиза Лесия небрежно ответила:\n\n«Говорите, что я не воспитана, а это нормально так общаться со своей дочерью? Хотите прославиться как отец, заморивший голодом свою дочь?\"\n\nПосле этих слов маркиз сердито закричал:\n\n«Ты, должно быть, наконец-то сошла с ума!»\n\n«Да, я сумасшедшая.»\n\n---\n**Original Web
